title: G N A R L Y   S P E E D P A I N T   V I D E O

embed.description: g n a r l y This is a speedpaint of Gnar, The Missing Link from the League of Legends franchise. Character belongs to them & Riot Games. If you haven't played League of Legends before, you should! It's free to play! ^_^ Enjoy~ Media used: Paint Tool SAI Allotted time: approx.

body:
{{champion:150}} geddit? somebody kill me plz.

[deviantART link](http://goldhedgehog.deviantart.com/art/G-N-A-R-L-Y-569075489)

If you guys have any questions about the artwork such as what brush settings I use etc. Feel free to ask them in the comments. More than happy to answer them.

**Note:** Sorry if you're confused by my Summoner name with the (NA) region marker on it. I usually transfer back and forth between OCE and NA to play with friends across the Pacific Ocean :)

replies.body: Great video man! I dunno why this doesn't have more views, I swear people on OCE are so uncultured when it comes to community creation.
